name: Omnie Solutions
tag_list: enterprise-application-development, mobile-application-development, resources-augmentation, web-development-company, ecommerce-application-application-development-company, sharepoint-application-development, biztalk, powerbuilder
overview:
Omnie Solutions (I) Pvt. Ltd, founded in 2000, is web application development company. We are group of well experienced professionals to meet our client expectations by innovative conceptions.Our precision, rational thinking, diverse technical expertise and unique creativity build sustainable and flexible business solutions. Omnie aim to innovate around all edges to make solutions simple and customer experience understandable.

Below is our Services that we offer:

Enterprise Application development Custom Enterprise Application Development eCommerce Website Development Resources and Staff Augmentation Services Mobile Application development Portal testing Services Digital Marketing PPC Marketing Social Media Marketing SEO for eCommerce Website and Portals Data Management Solutions

Our Technology:-

We work on different Technology:

Microsoft Technology(sharePoint 2010, .net, power builder Biztalk, Window Azures etc) IBM Web Sphere(Sterling Commerce) Oracle Technology PHP Java Java Script Data Base Migration
